resources.string: "When the NLP function is installed and opened, Baidu location services will collect anonymous location data. This will occur even when no apps are running. Some data may be stored on your device. This may incur additional charges. The data collected will be used to find your location and improve accuracy. We ensure that your data will not be shared with other parties or be used for purposes other than providing services. The following data will be collected. - ID, Signal Strength of WLAN AP to be surveyed from the periphery. - ID, Signal Strength to be surveyed from the peripheral base station (for GSM and CDMA)."
When the NLP function is installed and opened, Baidu location services will collect anonymous location data. This will occur even when no apps are running. Some data may be stored on your device.

This may incur additional charges. The data collected will be used to find your location and improve accuracy. We ensure that your data will not be shared with other parties or be used for purposes other than providing services. The following data will be collected.
ID, Signal Strength of WLAN AP to be surveyed from the periphery.
ID, Signal Strength to be surveyed from the peripheral base station (for GSM and CDMA).
Closed NetworkLocation service will cause any application can not location.
In order to bring you a better user experience, the system will open network location service.

"Allow Baidu's location service to collect anonymous location data. Some data may be stored on your device, and collection may occur even when no apps are running. Applicable data usage fees may apply during this process."
Allow network location service and applications to scan for WLANs, even when WLAN is turned off
